chapters.name: fundamental principles of Ayurvediya Kriya Sharir
chapters.description:
Conceptual study of fundamental principles of Ayurvediya Kriya Sharir e.g.
                                         Panchamahabhuta, Tridosha, Triguna, Loka-Purusha Samya, Samanya Vishesha, RasaVirya-Vipaka etc. Description of Basics of Srotas.
